a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual change in average female height, 1897 to 1996
The relative annual change in the mean height of adult women by year of birth. Data for the latest cohort (the year
1996) is therefore the mean height of women aged 18 in 2014. Positive values indicate an increase in average
height; negative values indicate a decline.
